page.title: 07RICHARD'S DAY
page.content: I normally wake at about 7.25 a.m. and after washing and dressing, I go downstairs for breakfast; grapefruit, toast and coffee. At 8.40 a.m. my mother drives me to school, where I play football until going in at 9.00 a.m. During the first half of the morning I am involved with mathematics and reading and, after break, in topic work. Lunchtime is from noon until 1.15 p.m. I always have my packed meal during that time before going out to play if the weather is fine. During the afternoon I do art and some written work, and later on P.E. At 3.45 p.m. my mum comes and takes me home. I then change into some different clothes and play on my computer. At 6 p.m. I have my tea. Then I read my reading book and practice my musical instruments. I have a shower and go to bed.
